net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: [h: changes = "[0,-20,-10,-5,'+5','+10','+20']"] [h: junk = abort(input("elevation|"+elevation+"|Elevation (0 clears)|text","elevation_index|" + json.toList(changes) + "|Elevation Change|list" ))] [h: elevation = add(elevation, number(json.get(changes,elevation_index)))] [h,if(elevation == 0):resetProperty("elevation");setProperty("elevation", elevation)]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Change Elevation
